what_is_BernatRewards: Bernat Rewards represents an innovative competitive learning platform designed by Bernat el Ferrer. Here, you will have the opportunity to accumulate points as recognition for your outstanding contributions in the academic environment.
start_wining_now: Access your account to start accumulating points for your active participation in classes. Every contribution counts to increase your points and unlock interesting rewards!
competitive_learning: Immerse yourself in an exciting and competitive learning experience through the Bernat Rewards points system. Compete with your peers to reach the top of the ranking and demonstrate who accumulates the most points.
login_text: Log in to start accumulating points!
buy_text: Spend your points on advantages or amenities!
upgrade_text: Learn while competing with your friends!
how_to_earn_points_text: Participate actively during classes, ask questions that help you better understand the topics, and strive in your tasks and activities. Your teachers will value your commitment and dedication and reward you with Bernat points, a special currency that you can use to get exclusive and special rewards.
cauition_for_the_auctions_text: Stay tuned for temporary auctions where you can use your points. Your teachers will keep you informed about when these special auctions will take place, giving you the opportunity to participate. Take advantage of this unique opportunity to get exclusive rewards with your Bernat points.
